ai-mil3.1.15:1.2_0: “Sir, what is the mark of a giant?”
ai-mil3.1.15:1.4_0: And he has the characteristic of wisdom.”
ai-mil3.1.15:1.5_0: “Sir, how is the mark of wisdom?”
ai-mil3.1.15:1.6_0: “Great king, when perception arises in the darkness is dispelled, the light does not arise in the darkness of the noble ones.
ai-mil3.1.15:1.7_0: because of that, all those of them will know: ‘This is suffering’ or ‘This is impermanent.’
ai-mil3.1.15:2.2_0: “A person invites the dark of the night a lamp in the dark of the light, so why then forms into the darkness of light, up eventually praised light.
ai-mil3.1.15:2.3_0: In the same way, when wisdom arises in the darkness and lights up the darkness of eradication, and then a fathoms of wisdom.
ai-mil3.1.15:2.4_0: Yet he sees that all is impermanent, suffering, and perishable.
ai-mil3.1.15:2.5_0: That’s how wisdom is its characteristic.”
